t: Lord,*spn who may dwell in your sacred tent? Who*ld may live on your holy mountain?
The*pn one whose walk is blameless, who*ld does what is righteous, who*ld speaks the truth from their heart;
whose*ln tongue utters no slander, who*ld does no wrong to a neighbor, and*ld casts no slur on others;
who*ln despises a vile person but*ld honors those who fear the Lord;*s who*ln keeps an oath even when it hurts, and*ld does not change their mind;
who*ln lends money to the poor without interest; who*ld does not accept a bribe against the innocent. Whoever*pn does these things will*ld never be shaken.
